Use col-1 ... col-12[/list_item] [list_item icon="icon-cog"]last_column - Specify if your column is last in row[/list_item] [list_item icon="icon-cog"]bottom_margin - Specify if your column has the bottom margin.[/list_item] [/list]

item.title: Icon Separators
item.dc:creator: hbthemes
item.content:encoded:
[section] [column size="col-6"] [h5_focus_heading]More than 350+ icons to choose[/h5_focus_heading] Notable comes with awesome separators shortcode. There are over 350+ icons to choose. We have included both, Entypo and Font Awesome in our theme. The separator shortcode is fully covered with our Shortcode Generator, you can create these shortcodes in just a few clicks - No codes!. [/column] [column size="col-6" last_column="true"] [h5_focus_heading]Looks great on all devices[/h5_focus_heading] Your website will not look awesome only on your desktop but on every single tablet or phone. This theme is designed to look amazing on every device. Try resizing your browser window to see it in action. [screen size="desktop"][infobox color="blue"]You're currenty viewing it on Desktop Screen.[/infobox][/screen] [screen size="phone"][infobox color="blue"]You're currenty viewing it on Phone Screen.[/infobox][/screen] [screen size="tablet"][infobox color="blue"]You're currenty viewing it on Tablet Screen.[/infobox][/screen] [/column] [/section] [separator icon="icon-globe" title="Did we mention this caption is optional?"]   [separator icon="icon-heart" title="Did we mention this caption is optional?"]   [separator icon="icon-truck" title="Did we mention this caption is optional?"]   [separator icon="icon-umbrella" title="Did we mention this caption is optional?"]   [separator icon="icon-bullhorn" title="Did we mention this caption is optional?"]   [separator icon="icon-bolt" title="Did we mention this caption is optional?"]   [separator icon="icon-comments-alt" title="Did we mention this caption is optional?"]   [separator icon="icon-comments" title="Did we mention this caption is optional?"]   [separator icon="icon-group" title="Did we mention this caption is optional?"]   [separator icon="icon-wrench" title="Did we mention this caption is optional?"]   [separator icon="icon-cogs" title="Did we mention this caption is optional?"]   [separator icon="icon-cloud" title="Did we mention this caption is optional?"]   [separator icon="icon-ok" title="Did we mention this caption is optional?"]   [separator icon="icon-fire" title="Did we mention this caption is optional?"]   [separator icon="icon-bell" title="Did we mention this caption is optional?"]   [separator icon="icon-off" title="Did we mention this caption is optional?"]   [separator icon="icon-beaker" title="Did we mention this caption is optional?"]   [infobox last_column="true" color="blue" size="col-12"]There's over 350 icons you can use for separators. Find them here.   Aegaeus comes with super awesome user friendly Shortcode Generator which allows you to create any of many shortcodes in less than 2 clicks. If you prefer the code, you can find it bellow. You can copy-paste it to your page. Comments are annotated with double slashes //[/infobox] [clear] [section] [toggle title="Get the code"]

item.title: From Portfolio
item.dc:creator: hbthemes
item.content:encoded:
[section] [portfolio number="12" columns="3"] [/section] [separator text="How to use"] [infobox last_column="true" color="blue" size="col-12"]Aegaeus comes with super awesome user friendly Shortcode Generator which allows you to create any of many shortcodes in less than 2 clicks. If you prefer the code, you can find it bellow. You can copy-paste it to your page. Comments are annotated with double slashes //[/infobox] [clear] [section] [toggle title="Get the code"] 
// Create 12 Portfolio Items with one third column size and having slugs "portfolios, notable"

[portfolio number="12" columns="3" category="portfolios, notable" ]
[/toggle] [/section] [separator small="true"] [h5]Available argument options[/h5] [list] [list_item icon="icon-cog"]number - Specify number of your portfolio posts to show.[/list_item] [list_item icon="icon-cog"]columns - Specify the number of columns.[/list_item] [list_item icon="icon-cog"]category - Specify which items will appear - they must belong to one of the entered slugs (leave empty to extract all items).[/list_item] [/list]

[infobox size="col-12" last_column="true" color="blue" bottom_margin="false"]Aegaeus is super flexible. You can choose for each page different sidebar, slider, background images, textures, breadcrumbs, title, description, custom SEO and many other awesome things. It also comes with an amazing Shortcode Generator which supports hundreds of shortcode variations.[/infobox]

item.title: Show Offs
item.dc:creator: hbthemes
item.content:encoded:
[infobox color="grey" size="col-12"]This shortcode will get your viewers eyes where you want 'em. You can animate every object on a page, from any shortcode to any custom piece you have written. Bring spark to your pages with this one.   Show Off Animations is just one group of animations. There are also Bounce Ins, BounceOuts, Fade Ins, Fade Outs, Flip Ins & Flip Outs, Roll Ins & Roll Outs, Rotate Ins, Rotate Outs.[/infobox] [spacer] [section] [column size="col-2" bottom_margin="false"][animate animation="flash" duration="1.5s" delay="0s" iteration="2000"][button title="Flash" color="" size="xlarge" link="#" icon=""][/animate][/column] [column size="col-2" bottom_margin="false"][animate animation="shake" duration="1.5s" delay="0s" iteration="2000"][button title="Shake" color="" size="xlarge" link="#" icon=""][/animate][/column] [column size="col-2" bottom_margin="false"][animate animation="bounce" duration="1.3s" delay="0s" iteration="2000"][button title="Bounce" color="" size="xlarge" link="#" icon=""][/animate][/column] [column size="col-2" bottom_margin="false"][animate animation="tada" duration="1.5s" delay="0s" iteration="2000"][button title="Tada" color="" size="xlarge" link="#" icon=""][/animate][/column] [column size="col-2" bottom_margin="false"][animate animation="swing" duration="1.5s" delay="0s" iteration="2000"][button title="Swing" color="" size="xlarge" link="#" icon=""][/animate][/column] [column size="col-2" bottom_margin="false" last_column="true"][animate animation="wiggle" duration="1.5s" delay="0s" iteration="2000"][button title="Wiggle" color="" size="xlarge" link="#" icon=""][/animate][/column]

If you prefer the code, you can find it bellow. You can copy-paste it to your page. Comments are annotated with double slashes //[/infobox] [clear] [section] [toggle title="Get the code"] 
 // Create a Pulse lasting 1 second, repeating 1 times, with 0 seconds delay.

[section]

[column size="col-2"]

[animate animation="pulse" iteration="1" delay="0s" duration="1s"]
[button link="#" size="large" title="Pulse"]
[/animate]

[/column]

[/section]
[/toggle] [/section] [separator small="true"] [h5]Available argument options[/h5] [list] [list_item icon="icon-cog"]animation - Specify the animation type.[/list_item] [list_item icon="icon-cog"]duration - Specify how long the animation lasts.[/list_item] [list_item icon="icon-cog"]iteration - Specify how many times the animation repeats.[/list_item] [list_item icon="icon-cog"]delay - Specify after what time the animation starts.[/list_item] [/list]

item.title: Media Screen
item.dc:creator: hbthemes
item.content:encoded:
[column size="col-6" bottom_margin="true"][h5]Supported by Shortcode Generator[/h5]This shortcode is super awesome. The greatest thing is that you can create it in 2 clicks with our Shortcode Generator and you can use it with any page element.[/column] [column size="col-6" last_column="true" bottom_margin="true'][h5]Different content for different device[/h5]You can display content only on devices you want. Have a look at the example bellow. Try resizing your browser to see this shortcode in action.[/column] [clear] [separator] [section] [column last_column="true"] [screen size="desktop"]

 [icon icon="icon-eye-open" size="90px" color="ff7700"]

[infobox last_column="true" bottom_margin="false" closable="false" color="grey"]This content is visible only on Desktop screens.[/infobox] [/screen] [screen size="tablet"]

 [icon icon="icon-globe" size="90px" color="c21e60"]

[infobox last_column="true" bottom_margin="false" closable="false" color="blue"]This content is visible only on Tablet screens.[/infobox] [/screen] [screen size="phone-landscape"]

 [icon icon="icon-bolt" size="90px" color="3355ff"]

[infobox last_column="true" bottom_margin="false" closable="false" color="red"]This content is visible only on Phone Landscape screens.[/infobox] [/screen] [screen size="phone-portrait"]

 [icon icon="icon-heart" size="90px" color="336699"]

[infobox last_column="true" bottom_margin="false" closable="false" color="green"]This content is visible only on Phone Portrait screens.[/infobox] [/screen] [/column] [/section] [separator text="How to use"] [infobox last_column="true" size="col-12" color="blue"]Notable comes with super awesome user friendly Shortcode Generator which allows you to create any of many shortcodes in less than 2 clicks. If you prefer the code, you can find it bellow. You can copy-paste it to your page. Comments are annotated with double slashes //[/infobox] [clear] [section] [toggle title="Get the code"] 
// Create desktop screen content only
[screen size="desktop"]Your content goes here[/screen]

//Create tablet screen content only
[screen size="tablet"]Your content goes here[/screen]

//Create phone screen content only
[screen size="phone"]Your content goes here[/screen]
[/toggle] [/section] [separator small="true"] [h5]Available argument options[/h5] [list] [list_item icon="icon-cog"]screen - Specify your target screen. You can use following : desktop, tablet, phone, phone-landscape, phone-portrait.[/list_item] [/list]

// Wrap tabs in one half column and section
[section]
[column size="col-6"]

// Create tabs with layers effect and three tab items
[tabs layers="true"]

// Create three tab items
[tab title="Tab Item 1"] Tab 1 Content here[/tab]
[tab title="Tab Item 2"] Tab 2 Content here [/tab]
[tab title="Tab Item 3"] Tab 3 Content here [/tab]

[/section]

[testimonials columns="2" number="2"] [separator] [testimonials columns="3" number="3"] [separator] [testimonials columns="4" random="false" number="4"] [separator text="How To Use"] [infobox last_column="true" size="col-12" color="blue"]Aegaeus comes with super awesome user friendly Shortcode Generator which allows you to create any of many shortcodes in less than 2 clicks. If you prefer the code, you can find it bellow. You can copy-paste it to your page. Comments are annotated with double slashes //[/infobox] [clear] [section] [toggle title="Get the code"] 
// Get 3 random testimonials and display them in 3 columns
[testimonials columns="3" number="3" random="true"]

// Get 4 testimonials and display them in 2 columns
[staff columns="2" number="4" random="false"]
[/toggle] [/section] [separator small="true"] [h5]Available argument options[/h5] [list] [list_item icon="icon-cog"]number - Specify number of your testimonials to show.[/list_item] [list_item icon="icon-cog"]columns - Specify in how many columns will they appear.[/list_item] [list_item icon="icon-cog"]random - Specify in random testimonials are being displayed (if false, menu_order is active).[/list_item] [/list]

item.title: Custom Post Types
item.dc:creator: hbthemes
item.content:encoded: [h4]Including Some Interesting Custom Post Types[/h4] Aegaeus comes with four custom post types. They are making it easy to customize the content for each seaction. Portfolio items can be sorted using the Portfolio Filters, and categorized by Portfolio Categories. The single portfolio page can have a detailed description section if you wish. Put your Staff members into Staff Departments and make it easy to display only those who work in that particular department!

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Just to make your work easier
Just to make your work easier
Just to make your work easier

item.title: Unlimited Colors
item.dc:creator: hbthemes
item.content:encoded: [h4]Unlimited Color Options[/h4] Our powerful Theme Options includes a Styles Settings which has an advanced color picker. This easy to use color picker let's you choose literally any color you wish and apply it to the theme. You can drag through the picker, or you can manually enter a hex code of your liking. Beautiful!

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Use any color for any element
Use any color for any element
Use any color for any element

item.title: Shortcode Generator
item.dc:creator: hbthemes
item.content:encoded: [h4]Intuitive shortcode generator included[/h4] We want to make the page building quick and easy, but at the same time retaining a high quality level. We made this beautiful shortcode generator, which makes it incredibly easy to insert many shortcodes in the pages with little to no effort. It's the ultimate user friendly feature! Every shortcode can be also written and edited manually.

item.title: Responsive Flex Slider
item.dc:creator: hbthemes
item.content:encoded: [h4]Responsive Flex Slider[/h4] Other than the Revolution slider, Aegaeus comes with a very beautiful and easy to use Flex Slider. Create as many sliders as you want, using the Theme Options. An awesome feature we implemented is the Flex Slider shortcode, which means that you can insert this slider anywhere in this theme, in the content area, widget area, even inside other shortcodes! Another possible option is making the slider in the place of the featured image, by simply specifying that in the page Custom Settings.

item.title: Right Side Tour
item.dc:creator: hbthemes
item.content:encoded: [h4]Switch Tour Sides[/h4] The Tour Template is not left sided only! You can easily change the tour position for each tour element you create. Easily changeable in the meta box Custom Settings, this template is ridiculously easy to create.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Choose between left and right side tours
Choose between left and right side tours
Choose between left and right side tours

item.title: Extensive Documentation
item.dc:creator: hbthemes
item.content:encoded:
[h4]Online and Offline Documentation Included[/h4] Aegaeus comes with extensive documentations on how to set up your theme. It starts from the basic settings, such as: how to create homepages, use page templates, use post formats, etc. On the other hand, the documentation has explanation and an example on every shortcode included in the theme. You can find info on all of scripts and styles we used while developing Aegaeus. A very clean documentation will help you understand the way our theme works so you can make the best out of it! [spacer] [separator small="true"] [spacer]

[button size="xlarge" color="grey" icon="icon-chevron-right" link="http://hb-themes.com/themes/aegaeus_wp/online-documentation/" title="Online Documentation"]
